definitions.definition: Food waste material of any kind.
definitions.example: Garbage is collected on Tuesdays; rubbish on Fridays

definitions.definition: Useless or disposable material; waste material of any kind.
definitions.example: The garbage truck collects all residential municipal waste.

definitions.definition: A place or receptacle for waste material.
definitions.example: He threw the newspaper into the garbage.

definitions.definition: The bowels of an animal; refuse parts of flesh; offal.

definitions.example: He gave me some pretty garbage advice last night.
